item.description:
Becky's room is upstairs. If anyone has mobility issues, please let me know.

Just a note, we will be enforcing attendance policies this year. We had a couple of no shows last time around. You are allowed two no-shows per year and then will be removed from RSVP lists. We do keep the RSVP list open until the event in case of emergencies, etc - so if needed, changing your RSVP 15 minutes before will not count as a no-show. We want to be courteous to the restaurants hosting larger parties.
item.name: Early Valentine's Brunch
